channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenAM Consortium -- OpenAM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenAM Consortium -- OpenAM

item.title: CVE-2018-0696|2024-08-05T03:35:49.004Z -- openam%20consortium -- openam
item.description: OpenAM (Open Source Edition) 13.0 and later does not properly manage sessions, which allows remote authenticated attackers to change the security questions and reset the login password via unspecified vectors.
